attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think the government should provide more funding for schools to buy sports equipment for lunchtimes. This will hopefully tackle the isue of obesity, help children to make new friends and work as a team and hopefully prevent children from bunking school and smoking or eating junk food at lunchtime.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
